SA15dhknyayu:113_0: sarvatra ca asyām abhāva-vyavahāra-sādhanyām anupalabdhau yeṣāṃ svabhāva-viruddha-ādīnām
SA15dhknyayu:113_1: upalabdhyā kāraṇa-ādīnām anupalabdhyā ca pratiṣedha uktas teṣām upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptānām.
SA15dhknyayu:125: yad upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptaṃ sann na upalabhyate so asad-vyavahāra-viṣayaḥ siddhaḥ,
SA15dhknyayu:126: yathā anyaḥ kaścid dṛṣṭaḥ śaśa-viṣāṇa-ādiḥ. na upalabhyate ca kaścit pradeśa-viśeṣa upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāpto ghaṭa ity anupalabdhi-prayogaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:127: tathā svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ: yat sat tat sarvam anityam,
SA15dhknyayu:128: yathā ghaṭa-ādir iti śuddhasya svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:129: yad utpattimat tad anityam iti svabhāvabhūta-dharma-bhedena svabhāvasya prayogaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:130: yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityam ity upādhi-bhedena.
SA15dhknyayu:131: apekṣita-para-vyāpāro hi bhāvaḥ svabhāva-niṣpattau kṛtaka iti.
SA15dhknyayu:133: sann utpattimān kṛtako vā śabda iti pakṣa-dharma-upadarśanam.
SA15dhknyayu:134: sarva ete sādhana-dharmā yathāsvaṃ pramāṇaiḥ. siddha-sādhana-dharma-mātra-anubandha eva sādhya-dharmo avagantavyāḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:140: kāryahetoḥ prayogaḥ: yatra dhūmas tatra agniḥ, yathā mahānasa-ādau. asti ca iha dhūma iti.
SA15dhknyayu:141: iha api siddha eva kāryakāraṇabhāve kāraṇe sādhye kāryahetur vaktavyaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:142: vaidharmyavataḥ prayogaḥ: yat sad upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptaṃ tad upalabhyata eva,
SA15dhknyayu:143: yathā nīla-ādi-viśeṣaḥ. na ca evam iha upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptasya sata upalabdhir ghaṭasya ity anupalabdhi-prayogaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:144: asaty anityatve na asty eva sattvam utpattimattvaṃ kṛtakatvaṃ vā. saṃś ca śabda utpattimān kṛtako vā iti svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:145: asaty agnau na bhavaty eva dhūmaḥ. atra ca asti dhūma iti kāryahetoḥ prayogaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:146: sādharmyeṇa api hi prayoge arthād vaidharmya-gatir iti.
SA15dhknyayu:150: na hi svabhāvapratibandhe asaty ekasya nivṛttav aparasya niyamena nivṛttiḥ.

SA15dhknyayu:156_2: ity ukte sāmarthyād eva na iha ghaṭa iti bhavati.
SA15dhknyayu:157: tathā vaidharmyavat-prayoge api: yaḥ sad-vyavahāra-viṣaya upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptaḥ,
SA15dhknyayu:158: sa upalabhyata eva. na tathā atra tādṛśo ghaṭa upalabhyata ity ukte sāmarthyād eva na iha sad-vyavahāra-viṣaya iti bhavati.
SA15dhknyayu:160: svarūpeṇa eva svayam iṣṭo anirākṛtaḥ pakṣa iti.
SA15dhknyayu:162: svarūpeṇa eva iti sādhyatvena eva iṣṭo na sādhanatvena api.
SA15dhknyayu:163: yathā śabdasya anityatve sādhye cākṣuṣatvaṃ hetuḥ,
SA15dhknyayu:164: śabde asiddhatvāt sādhyam. na punas tad iha sādhyatvena eva iṣṭam,
SA15dhknyayu:168: etena yady api kvacic śāstre sthitaḥ sādhanam āha:
SA15dhknyayu:169: tac śāstrakāreṇa tasmin dharmiṇy aneka-dharma-abhyupagame api yas tadā tena vādinā dharmaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitum iṣṭaḥ,
SA15dhknyayu:170: sa eva sādhyo na itara ity uktaṃ bhavati.
SA15dhknyayu:171: iṣṭa iti yatra arthe vivādena sādhanam upanyastaṃ tasya siddhim icchatā so anukto api vacanena sādhyaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:173: yathā parārthaś cakṣur-ādayaḥ saṃghātatvāc śayana-āsana-ādy-aṅga-vad iti. atra ātma-arthā ity anuktāv apy ātma-arthatā sādhyā. tena na ukta-mātram eva sādhyam ity uktaṃ bhavati.
SA15dhknyayu:175: etal-lakṣaṇa-yoge api yaḥ sādhayitum iṣṭo apy arthaḥ pratyakṣa-anumāna-pratīti-sva-vacanair nirākriyate,
SA15dhknyayu:177: tatra pratyakṣa-nirākṛto yathā, aśrāvaṇaḥ śabda iti.
SA15dhknyayu:185: ukta-mātrasya ca viparyayeṇa sādhyaḥ. tena eva svarūpeṇa abhimato vādina iṣṭo anirākṛtaḥ pakṣa iti pakṣa-lakṣaṇam anavadyaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati.
SA15dhknyayu:186: trirūpaliṅga-ākhyānaṃ parārtha-anumānam ity uktam. tatra trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇām ekasya api rūpasya anuktau sādhanābhāsaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:187: uktāv apy asiddhau sandehe vā pratipādya-pratipādakayoḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:188: ekasya rūpasya dharmi-sambandhasya asiddhau sandehe vā asiddho hetvābhāsāḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:189: yathā, anityaḥ śabda iti sādhye cākṣuṣatvam ubhaya-asiddham.
SA15dhknyayu:190: cetanās tarava iti sādhye sarva-tvag-apaharaṇe maraṇaṃ prativādy-asiddham,
SA15dhknyayu:193: acetanāḥ sukha-ādaya iti sādhye utpattimatvaṃ vā sāṃkhyasya svayaṃ vādino asiddham.
SA15dhknyayu:194: tathā svayaṃ tad-āśrayaṇasya vā sandehe asiddhaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:195: yathā bāṣpa-ādi-bhāvena sandihyamāno bhūta-saṃghāto agni-siddhāv upadiśyamānaḥ sandigdha-asiddhaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:196: yathā iha nikuñje mayūraḥ kekāyitād iti.
SA15dhknyayu:198: dharmy-asiddhāv apy asiddhaḥ, yathā sarvagata ātmā iti sādhye sarvatra upalambhamāna-guṇatvam.
SA15dhknyayu:199: tathā ekasya rūpasya asapakṣe asattvasya asiddhāv anaikāntiko hetvābhāsaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:200: yathā śabdasya anityatva-ādike dharme sādhye prameyatva-ādiko dharmaḥ sapakṣa-vipakṣayoḥ sarvatra ekadeśe vā vartamānaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:201: tathā, asya eva rūpasya sandehe apy anaikāntika eva.
SA15dhknyayu:202: yathā asarvajñaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāga-ādimān vā sādhye vaktṛtva-ādiko dharmaḥ sandigdha-vipakṣa-vyāvṛttikaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:203: sarvajño vaktā na upalabhyate ity evaṃprakārasya anupalambhasya adṛśya-ātma-viṣayatvena sandeha-hetutvāt. tato asarvajña-viparyayād vaktṛtva-āder vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdhā.
SA15dhknyayu:204: vaktṛtva-sarvajñatvayor virodha-abhāvāc ca yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sa vaktā na bhavati ity adarśane api vyatireko na sidhyati sandehāt.
SA15dhknyayu:209: sa ca dvividho api virodho vaktṛtva-sarvajñatvayor na sambhavati.
SA15dhknyayu:210: na ca aviruddha-vidher anupalabdhāv apy abhāva-gatiḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:212: arthāntarasya ca akāraṇasya nivṛttau na vacana-āder nivṛttiḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:218: yathā kṛtakatvaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ ca nityatve sādhye viruddho hetvābhāsaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:219: anayoḥ sapakṣe asattvam, asapakṣe ca sattvam iti viparyaya-siddhiḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:221: nanu ca tṛtīyo api iṣṭa-vighāta-kṛd viruddhaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:222: yathā parārthāś cakṣur-ādayaḥ saṃghātatvāc śayana-āsana-ādy-aṅga-vad iti.
SA15dhknyayu:226: na hy ayam ābhyāṃ sādhya-viparyaya-sādhanatvena bhidyate.
SA15dhknyayu:227: na hi iṣṭa-uktayoḥ sādhyatvena kaścid viśeṣa iti.
SA15dhknyayu:228: dvayo rūpayor ekasya asiddhāv aparasya ca sandehe anaikāntikaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:229: yathā vīta-rāgaḥ kaścit sarvajño vā, vaktṛtvād iti. vyatireko atra asiddhaḥ, sandigdho anvayaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:230: sarvajña-vīta-rāgayor viprakarṣād vacana-ādes tatra sattvam asattvaṃ vā sandigdham.
SA15dhknyayu:231: anayor eva dvayo rūpayoḥ sandehe anaikāntikaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:233: na hi sātmaka-nirātmakābhyām anyo rāśir asti yatra ayaṃ prāṇa-ādir vartate.
SA15dhknyayu:236: sātmakatvena anātmakatvena vā prasiddhe prāṇa-āder asiddheḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:237: tasmāj jīvaccharīra-sambandhī prāṇa-ādiḥ sātmakād anātmakāc ca sarvasmād vyāvṛttatvena asiddhes tābhyāṃ na vyatiricyate.
SA15dhknyayu:240: na api sātmakād anātmakāc ca tasya anvaya-vyatirekayor abhāva-niścayaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:242: anvaya-vyatirekayor anyonya-vyavaccheda-rūpatvāt. tata eva anvaya-vyatirekayoḥ sandehād anaikāntikāḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:244: evam eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇām ekaikasya dvayor dvayor vā rūpayor asiddhau sandehe vā yathāyogam asiddha-viruddha-anaikāntikās trayo hetvābhāsāḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:245: viruddhāvyabhicāry api saṃśaya-hetur uktaḥ. sa iha kasmān na uktaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:247: na hi sambhavo asti kārya-svabhāvayor ukta-lakṣaṇayor anupalambhasya ca viruddhatāyāḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:249: tasmād avastu-darśana-bala-pravṛttam āgama-āśrayam anumānam āśritya tad-artha-vicāreṣu viruddhāvyabhicārī sādhana-doṣa uktaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:251: na hy asya sambhavo yathāvasthita-vastu-sthitiṣv ātma-kārya-anupalambheṣu.
SA15dhknyayu:253: yat sarva-deśa-avasthitaiḥ sva-sambandhibhir yugapad abhisambadhyate tat sarvagatam,
SA15dhknyayu:254: yathā ākāśam. abhisambadhyate ca sarva-deśa-avasthitaiḥ sva-sambandhibhir yugapat sāmānyam iti.
SA15dhknyayu:256: na hi yo yatra na asti tad-deśam ātmanā vyāpnoti iti svabhāvahetu-prayogaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:257: dvitīyo api prayogaḥ: yad upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptaṃ san na upalabhyate na tat tatra asti. tad yathā,
SA15dhknyayu:258_0: kvacid avidyamāno ghaṭaḥ. na upalabhyate ca upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptaṃ sāmānyaṃ vyakty-antarāleṣv
SA15dhknyayu:258_1: iti. ayam anupalambhaḥ svabhāvaś ca paraspara-viruddha-artha-sādhanād ekatra saṃśayaṃ janayataḥ.

SA15dhknyayu:260_0: hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvam asapakṣāc ca sarvato vyāvṛttī rūpam uktam abhedena. punar
SA15dhknyayu:260_1: viśeṣeṇa kārya-svabhāvayor ukta-lakṣaṇayor janma-tan-mātra-anubandhau darśanīya-avaktau. tac ca darśayatā,
SA15dhknyayu:262: asaty agnau na kvacid dhūmo yathā mahānasa-itarayoḥ,
SA15dhknyayu:266: iti darśanīyam. na hy anyathā sapakṣa-vipakṣayoḥ sadasattve yathokta-prakāre śakye darśayitum. tat kāryatā-niyamaḥ kārya-liṅgasya
SA15dhknyayu:267: svabhāva-liṅgasya ca svabhāvena vyāptiḥ. asmiṃś ca arthe darśite darśita eva dṛṣṭānto bhavati. etāvān mātra-rūpatvāt tasya iti.
SA15dhknyayu:268: etena eva dṛṣṭānta-doṣā api nirastā bhavanti.
SA15dhknyayu:269: yathā nityaḥ śabdo amūrtatvāt. karma-vat paramāṇu-vad ghaṭa-vad iti. ete dṛṣṭāntābhāsāḥ sādhya-sādhana-dharma-ubhaya-vikalāḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:271: yathā rāga-ādimān ayaṃ vacanād rathyā-puruṣa-vat. maraṇa-dharmo ayaṃ puruṣo rāga-ādimattvād rathyā-puruṣa-vat. asarvajño ayaṃ rāga-ādimatvād rathyā-puruṣa-vad iti.
SA15dhknyayu:274: iṣṭa-puruṣa-vat. anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ghaṭa-vad iti.
SA15dhknyayu:275: tathā viparīta-anvayaḥ, yad anityaṃ tat kṛtakam iti.
SA15dhknyayu:277: vaidharmyeṇa api, paramāṇu-vat karma-vat ākāśa-vad iti sādhya-ādy-avyatirekiṇaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:279: yathā asarvajñāḥ kapila-ādayo anāptā vā avidyamāna-sarvajñatā-āptatā-liṅgabhūta-pramāṇa-atiśaya-śāsanatvād iti. atra vaidharmya-udāharaṇam,
SA15dhknyayu:280: yaḥ sarvajña āpto vā sa jyotir-jñāna-ādikam upadiṣṭavān,
SA15dhknyayu:281: yathā ṛṣabha-vardhamāna-ādir iti. tatra asarvajñatā anāptayoḥ sādhya-dharmayoḥ sandigdho vyatirekaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:283: na trayīvidā brāhmaṇena grāhya-vacanaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāga-ādimattvād iti. atra vaidharmya-udāharaṇam,
SA15dhknyayu:284: ye grāhya-vacanā na te rāga-ādimantaḥ. tad yathā gautama-ādayo dharma-śāstrāṇāṃ praṇetāra iti. gautama-ādibhyo rāga-ādimattvasya sādhana-dharmasya vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdhā.
SA15dhknyayu:289: yathā ṛṣabha-āder iti. ṛṣabha-āder avīta-rāgatva-parigraha-āgraha-yogayoḥ sādhya-sādhana-dharmayoḥ sandigdho vyatirekaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:292: yatra avīta-rāgatvaṃ na asti na sa vaktā,
SA15dhknyayu:293: yathā upala-khaṇḍa iti. yady apy upala-khaṇḍād ubhayaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ tathā api sarvo vīta-rāgo na vaktā iti vyāptyā vyatireka-asiddher avyatirekaḥ.
SA15dhknyayu:294: apradarśita-vyatireko yathā, anityaḥ śabdaḥ, kṛtakatvād ākāśa-vad iti vaidharmyeṇa.
SA15dhknyayu:295: viparīta-vyatireko yathā, yad akṛtakaṃ tan nityaṃ bhavati iti.
SA15dhknyayu:296_0: na hy ebhir dṛṣṭāntābhāsāir hetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sapakṣa eva sattvaṃ vipakṣe ca
SA15dhknyayu:296_1: sarvatra asattvam eva niścayena śakyaṃ darśayituṃ viśeṣa-lakṣaṇaṃ vā. tad arthāpattyā
SA15dhknyayu:298: ye pūrvaṃ nyūnatā-ādayaḥ sādhana-doṣā uktās teṣām udbhāvanaṃ dūṣaṇam. tena para-iṣṭa-artha-siddhi-pratibandhāt.
